name: modern-library-bibliography-tools-site
description: Static site for Medern Library Bibliography
author: Doug Chestnut <dougchestnut@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn run build:local && yarn run build:docs
scripts.build:md: for f in src/mlb/yearDocs/*.docx; do pandoc "$f" -f docx -t markdown_strict -s -o "$f.md"; done; echo "WARNING: You most likely just overwrote hand edited markdown versions of the MLB docx files.  Hand edits were made to correct conversion irrgularities for consistancy."
scripts.build:local: rimraf build && yarn run build:js && npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.build:docs: rimraf docs && yarn run build:js && npx @11ty/eleventy --pathprefix='/modern-library-bibliography-tools' --output=docs
